about_the_game:
Rabbit Riot is an immersive horror adventure set in an abandoned mansion fraught with peril. Guide a courageous rabbit through the eerie halls and treacherous grounds as it endeavors to find its way home. Beware of menacing wolves, vengeful spirits, and the sinister remnants of past experiments.

Key Features:
  • Heart-Pounding Horror: Navigate a chilling atmosphere filled with suspense and mystery.
  • Intense Survival Gameplay: Use cunning and agility to evade deadly enemies and traps.
  • Unravel Dark Secrets: Piece together the mansion's grim history to uncover the truth behind its haunting.
  • Engaging Storyline: Experience a compelling narrative as you delve deeper into the rabbit's journey.
  • Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in beautifully crafted environments that evoke a sense of dread and wonder.
  • Multiple Endings: Your choices shape the outcome of the game, leading to different endings.
  • Unlockable Content: Discover hidden secrets and unlock bonus content as you progress.
  • Immersive Sound Design: Atmospheric sound effects and a haunting soundtrack intensify the horror experience.

name: Rabbit Riot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: intel i5 9600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 TI
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: intel i7 9700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Explore the abandoned mansion in this thrilling horror game. Help the rabbit get home, avoiding terrifying enemies and uncovering dark secrets of the past.
